posts.content:
Just seen this on the Samba and have lots of pics sent to me. It's not for me as it does need a fair bit of welding, but looks like a good basis for a project. I don't know the seller and have no interest in the bus, but thought others might be. It's very close to Norfolk, Virginia so shipping should be easy.
http://www.thesamba.com/vw/classifieds/detail.php?id=1875326
